Name: Warsaw Cooler
Ingredients: 15 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: STIR honey with vodka in base of shaker until honey dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: Orange, honey, apple and spice laced with Polish Bison grass vodka.
History: Created in 2002 by Morgan Watson of Apartment, Belfast, Northern Ireland.
Nutrition: One serving of Warsaw Cooler contains 218 calories
